definition: to follow/to adhere to/to abide by
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
circular argument/logical error consisting of begging the question/Latin: petitio principii

pinyin: mi4 bi4 shi4 xun2 huan2 zai4 hu1 xi1 shui3 fei4 xi4 tong3
containing_words.word: 密闭式循环再呼吸水肺系统

definition: recurring section of a rational decimal
citric acid cycle/Krebs cycle/tricarboxylic acid cycle

sentences.english: In the intimate circle of Friendlies, Huanhuan is the big brother.
sentences.chinese: 在体内循环的友谊赛，欢欢是大哥哥。

sentences.english: Therefore, HR becomes a kind of pass-through in the information cycle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人力资源人员在信息循环中承担传递的角色。

sentences.english: Sets a specific day within the year on which this event or to-do should recur.
sentences.chinese: 此事件或待办事项要于一年中的哪一天循环。

sentences.english: Currently there are different understandings and views on "XR", the technical paradigm of circular economy.
sentences.chinese: 对循环经济的技术范式，人们有着不同的认识和说法。

sentences.english: the recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.chinese: 补充的电流使其在现行的环形电路内循环。

sentences.english: Circulate inside, it is effectual to keep warm, energy-conservation.
sentences.chinese: 内循环，保温效果好，更节能。

sentences.english: We will vigorously develop the circular economy.
Add a loop or make a schedule to generate large data volumes.
sentences.chinese: 添加一个循环或者做一个安排以生成大型的数据集。

sentences.english: Is it beneficial to declare PHP anonymous functions outside a loop?
sentences.chinese: 它是有益的申报PHP匿名函数外循环？

sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.
sentences.chinese: 循环风设计，保证非吹淋状态下风淋区内的洁净度。

sentences.english: What would you think if one of your cells tried to patent the Krebs Cycle? Silly cells…
sentences.chinese: 当你的一个细胞要三羧酸循环的专利你怎么想？

sentences.english: In a matrix, or "round robin" competition, a round allows all contestants in a pool to fight once.
sentences.chinese: 在循环赛中，每一轮允许所有选手均比赛一次。

sentences.english: This paper will discuss a recycling-oriented society in the areas of dematerialization and detoxification.
sentences.chinese: 本论文以去物质化与去毒化探讨建立循环型社会课题。

sentences.english: The process is iterative, and each cycle is faster than its predecessor.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程是迭代的，每次循环都比前一个要快。

sentences.english: A standpipe was crucial for smooth circulation .
sentences.chinese: 一根立管对实现顺利循环至关重要。

sentences.english: The concentration of myricetin on MWNT/G was determined by cyclic voltammetry.
sentences.chinese: 采用循环伏安法对杨梅酮的浓度进行测定。

definition: to work/to operate/to revolve/to turn around
variant of 重複|重复[chong2 fu4]
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc)/(fig.) to function/to be in operation/(of a train service etc) to operate/to run/(of a computer) to run
